title: I can now say Hextech crafting has been a huge disappointment.
body:
Maybe other people got lucky.

Me?

After one year of opening a bunch of Hextech chests, I can safely say I have found NOTHING worth it.

Mostly I find skins or champions I have zero interest about. My latest Hextech opening has given me.......... Pantheon.

I've lost interest in getting key fragments as I just know I'm going to find something cheap and uninteresting in the chest anyway.

Compare with Heroes Of The Storm, where in every chest I open I find something I like, and if I find nothing I like..... I can reroll it!
